school.name: Sekolah Tun Fatimah, Johor Bahru, Malaysia

profile_positions.description:
* Team Management & Leadership
* Cross-Functional Stakeholder Engagement
* Global Payroll Provider Implementation
* Statutory Compliance & Internal Controls
* Outsourced Local Payroll Provider Solution
* End-to-end Payroll Operations & Employee Experience
* Human Resource Information System (HRIS) Deployment
* Change Management
* Corporate & Team KPI & OKR
* Merger & Acquisitions
* Process Improvement & Optimisation
* System Automation & Integration
profile_positions.title: Director, Global Payroll Operations

profile_positions.description:
* International Payroll Accounting
* International Payroll Operations
* External Audit Management
* Team Management
* Stakeholders Management & Relationship
* Process Improvement & Optimization
* Project Management
* General Ledger Accounting
* Cash Accounting
* Forecasting & Budgeting
* Cost & Fluctuation Analysis & Reporting
* Leading various payroll and accounting related projects including the following:
- Global General Allocation Program
- Standardizing payroll validation process
- Standardizing reconciliation process
- Payroll Cash Accounting Automation
- Robotic Process Automation
- International Stock Based Compensation Payroll & Reporting Process
- New payroll country/entity implementation
profile_positions.title: Manager, International Payroll Accounting & Compliance

profile_positions.description:
* Reviewing/approving payroll results
* Reviewing/approving all payroll payments
* Reviewing/posting monthly payroll journals
* Reviewing/posting monthly payroll reconciliations
* Point of escalations on payroll related matters
* Leading various payroll projects and country/entity implementations including the following:
- Conducting monthly new hires payroll induction training
- Conducted a payroll office hour
- Implementation of payment services for Turkey
- Leading the financials and payroll accounting processes review and enhancements for IPO readiness.
- Establishing a standard statutory declaration process in Uganda
- Preparation and presentation of our payroll materials and accounting reconciliations for the Tax Authority inspections/audits in Ghana and Nigeria.
- New country Implementations such as Pakistan, Tanzania and Uganda
profile_positions.title: EMEA Payroll Lead

profile_positions.description:
* Managing end-to-end payroll activities (up to 15 payroll entities at a time) including:
- Data collection
- Input validation
- Check and control
- Post payroll activities such as statutory declaration
* Engagement with the local providers on regular payroll processing matters as well as ad-hoc activities
* SME on Payroll related matters with various stakeholders; HR, Accounting, Compensation & Benefits, Treasury, Legal and employees.
* Implemented new processes for fulfilling various country specifics requirements and legislative compliance, process optimization/enhancement and payroll related ad-hoc projects:
- Russian vacation pay process
- Russia 2-payment payroll process - advance/mid-month and final payroll
- Belarus expense reimbursement process
- Portugal holiday and Christmas allowance; tax declaration, monthly payroll and GL accounting.
- Portugal Employment Compensation Funds
- Citibank currency control unit requirements process alignment
- WorkDay DataHub integration implementation with ADP
- Payment process optimization: Money movement services in place for Poland COE and Morocco and South Africa CSV bank/payment file
- New country/entity implementations: Bulgaria S&D, Morocco, Poland COE.
* Performing monthly payroll GL validation and reconciliations
* Attending and resolving employees queries via JIRA ticket management system
* Support internal and external audit including ad-hoc local authority inspections; Poland, Portugal, Kenya, Nigeria, Spain.
profile_positions.title: Senior Payroll Specialist EMEA

profile_positions.description:
* Involved in country payroll implementation: from outsourced payroll services to in-house ADP GlobalView processing model.
* Payroll SME throughout various projects such as country/entity enablement, merger & acquisition employee integration and G2 payroll interface roll-out for the countries portfolio.
* Performed in-depth hands-on GV system testing throughout country/entity implementations
* Responsible for countries monthly payroll end-to-end activities
* Completion of monthly and annual reporting requirements
* Responsible for payroll general ledger accounting: payroll journal generation, posting and validation, supporting Finance team throughout account reconciliations activities.
* Established strong professional relationships with payroll stakeholders internally and externally throughout the regular payroll operations and other ad-hoc projects and initiatives; Local HR, Employee Experience, Finance, statutory accountants, legal counsel.
* Ticket monitoring and change request management via CRM with ADP Client Services team, 
* Attending to payroll related queries and problem resolution with the employees and other stakeholders.
* Due diligence and internal control for compliance as well as positive internal and external audits assurance.
profile_positions.title: Payroll Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
* Part of the European collections team responsible for hitting monthly cash targets for the clients account portfolio.
* Built exceptional business relationships with Cisco clients within the portfolio and internal stakeholders including sales, customer service, finance, logistics, tax teams and others.
* Maintaining good performance in terms of cash, ageing debt reduction, clean ledger, dispute resolution, timely and accurate order release.
* Responsible for ad hoc reports and communications to the business based on issues that are current or topical with sound judgments and decisions concerning cash collection within defined practices and policies.
* Responsible for maintaining accurate client accounts statement, managing and resolving client disputes escalations in a timely and effective manner.
profile_positions.title: I2C & Accounts Receivable Analyst

profile_positions.description:
* Responsible for the proactive planning of all incoming work order allocations received within a specific geographic territory in Australia.
* Ensuring that all available resources are effectively utilized and predefined service levels are consistently achieved and contractual agreements met.
* Responsible for escalation management activities which provide end to end tracking for both field and customer.
* Maintaining effective and timely communication with engineers, obtaining regular progress updates for outstanding work orders, planning and logistic of required resources along with all required hardware for jobs completion.
* Working closely with peers from other territories for efficient cross-border resources allocation.
profile_positions.title: Customer Service Executive

profile_positions.description:
* Responsible for processing of credit and fraud authorization for banking products and facilities for multiple regions including United Kingdom, Netherlands, United States and Asia Pacific covering Australia, New Zealand, Singapore.
* Local alert monitoring (Malaysia) and emergency request as well as attending to merchant and customer inquiries on banking product and facilities.
* Responsible for reviewing and processing card referrals from merchants and conduct risk and reward balance study analysis prior to account blocking or unblocking.
* Various reporting for the management and other departments in regards to credit and validity of credit or charge products and facilities.
* Ad-hoc support to customer service operations; invalidating of lost, stolen or counterfeit credit and ATM card accounts.
profile_positions.title: Global Authorizations Analyst

profile_positions.description:
* Processing of Electronic Payment Services and Priority Payments orders of HSBC UK customers in accordance to global remitting procedures.
* Revision of electronic payments rejected by the automated systems and resolves issues for payments transmission within the standard service level agreement.
* Administration of HSBC UK customer mortgage accounts including cash flow management, interest rate review and necessary processing around all changes and movements on the accounts.
* Maintain strong business relationships with bank branches in the UK; close collaboration and engagement for high level services delivery to HSBC customers.
profile_positions.title: Global Support Executive
